texts.en: Oluwaseun O. is 32 years old and married with 2 children. She sells medicine and provisions. She is requesting a loan amount of N60,000 to purchase more medicine and provisions to sell.  She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase inventory

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard O. is 45 years old and married with 3 children. He sells provisions and drinks and he is also taxi driver. He is requesting a loan amount of N40,000 to purchase more provisions to sell. He says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase inventory

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Jean S., 31 years old, has been a rice farmer since she was a child in Bunawan, Agusan Del Sur. She says that, "Sometimes there is failure in business, so what a farmer should do is to apply fertilizers and new methods to increase the yield."

Having three children at home is difficult, especially since they have different demands. Jean is now asking for a loan of 11,000 PHP from Community Economic Ventures, Inc. She will use the loan to purchase fertilizers, rice seeds and chemicals.

CEVI provides credit assistance to her to sustain her farm. She also has access to training and insurance coverage by joining CEVI.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers, rice seeds and chemicals

loans.name: Christiana

texts.en: Christiana N. A. is 38 years old, married and has four children. She makes a living selling clothes, hand bags and shoes. She is applying for this loan to buy more items to sell to her customers, and wishes to express her thanks to all Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: To buy more clothes, bags and shoes to sell to her customers

loans.name: Taiwo

texts.en: Taiwo is 31 years old, married and has four children. She makes a living selling food items, and is applying for this loan to buy more products to sell to her customers. She wishes to extend her thanks to all Kiva lenders who make this loan possible.

loans.use: To buy more food items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Charity

texts.en: Charity makes a living selling second-hand clothing from her home. She is very business-focused and determined to lift her family out of poverty. She supplements her income by working as a fashion designer. Charity is 40 years old and has two children. She has applied for this loan to buy more second-hand clothing and a sewing machine. She extends her thanks to all Kiva participants who make this loan possible.

loans.use: To buy more second-hand clothes and a sewing machine

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 


Гафуржанова Насиба-  23х летняя девушка, живет с родителями,  помогает им в жизни, занимаясь предпринимательской деятельностью. Она продаёт подростковую одежду и женскую обувь. Также Насиба является медсестрой	в физлечебнице  и подрабатывает  услугами медсестры. Насиба думает ,что пока она не замужем, пока есть побольше свободного времени, она должна хорошенько заработать. Сотрудничество с Микроинвест помогло ей в этом. На следующий займ она намеревается закупить товар на школьный сезон и получить хорошую выгоду .
texts.en:
Nasiba G. is a 23-year-old young woman, who lives with her parents and helps support them through entrepreneurial activity. She sells adolescent clothing and women's shoes. Nasiba is also a nurse at a hospital and works as a nurse part-time. Nasiba thinks that while she is single and has more free time, she has to earn well. The cooperation with MicroInvest helped her with this. She plans to use her next loan to purchase merchandise for the school season and make a good profit.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Wholesale purchase of adolescent and women's clothing

loans.name: Isaac

texts.en: Isaac E. is 51 years old, married and has four children. He makes a living selling electrical parts, and has applied for this loan to buy more items to sell to his customers. He extends his thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To buy more electrical parts to sell to his customers

loans.name: Tina

texts.en: Tina is 35 years old and married with 4 children. Tina sells foodstuffs. She is requesting a loan amount of N50,000 to purchase more products to sell. She remains grateful to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more foodstuffs to sell

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en: Paulina N. is 42 years old and married with 4 children. She sells foodstuff in the market in Ibadan, Nigeria. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 60,000 NGN to purchase more foodstuff to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more foodstuff to sell

loans.name: Danilo

texts.en:
45-year old, Danilo J. is a rice farmer since he was a small kid. His parents taught him everything about rice , how to till and harvest the grains.   His wife Helen J. is also helping him in the farm. But because they are also having a sari-sari store business his wife is more focus on selling goods to help manage all expenses in their home.

Now, he needs a loan of Php 6,000. He will use the loan to buy fertilizers, rice seeds, and chemicals. 

CEVI helps small business grow. They provide all their clients with not just loans but trainings and insurance coverage as well.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers, rice seeds, and chemicals

loans.name: Adebayo

texts.en: Adebayo lives in Lagos State. She sells clothes, and she is also a fashion designer. Adebayo is 39 years old and married with 3 children. She hopes for a loan in the amount of 50,000 NGN to purchase more clothes to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell

loans.name: Fatimoh

texts.en: Fatimoh S. is 42 years old and married with 5 children. She sells foodstuffs in wholesale and retail. She is requesting a loan amount of 60,000 NGN to purchase more products to sell.  She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more foodstuffs to sell

loans.name: Olamide

texts.en: Olamide is 35 years old and married with two children. She has a salon where she makes lovely hair styles for her customers. She is requesting a loan of NGN 50,000 in order to purchase more hair extensions to sell.  She thanks all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase hair extensions to sell

loans.name: Unity

texts.en: Unity sells foodstuffs. She is 39 years old and married with 6 children. Unity hopes for the loan amount of N50,000 to purchase more foodstuffs to sell. She says thank you.

loans.use: To purchase more foodstuffs to sell

loans.name: Nike

texts.en: Nike is 35 years old and married with two children. She sells cosmetics and bottled water. She is requesting a loan of NGN 50, 000 to purchase more cosmetics to sell.  She thanks all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria U. is 32 years old and married with 4 children. She has a salon where she produces lovely hairstyles for her customers. She is requesting a loan amount of N50,000 to purchase more hair extensions to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more hair extensions to sell

loans.name: Faith

texts.en: Faith sells drinks and frozen foods such as turkey, chicken and fish. Faith is 45 years old and married with five children. Faith is asking for a loan of NGN 70, 000 to purchase more drinks and frozen food to sell. She says thank you.

loans.use: To purchase drinks and frozen foods

loans.name: Idowu

texts.en: Idowu is 42 years old and a widow with four children. She sells gift items and rechargeable phone cards. She is requesting a loan of NGN 50,000 to purchase more gift items and rechargeable phone cards.  She thanks all Kiva lenders

loans.use: To purchase gift items and rechargeable phone cards

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en: Rachael O. K. is 49 years old and married with seven children. She sells provisions and is requesting a loan of NGN 50,000 to purchase more provisions to sell.  She thanks all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions

loans.name: Shavkat

texts.ru:
MLF “MicroInvest” is one of the leading microfinance organizations, rendering credit services to the population of Tajikistan. Following step of its development, MLF “MicroInvest” sees in transformation into Microloan Deposit-taking Organization. Therefore in October, 2008 MLF “MicroInvest” together with LLC “Frontiers” have founded Limited Liability Company Microloan Deposit-taking Organization “Arvand”
      “Arvand” being assignee of “MicroInvest, continues to carry out its mission which is to improve the standard of living of the population and create new opportunities for social and economic development by providing qualitative financial-technical services to entrepreneurs of Tajikistan. 


Нурматов Шавкат- молодой мужчина со средним образованием ,ему 30 лет. Имеет жену и троих детей. У Шавката дружная семья, все вместе трудятся, зарабатывая свой хлеб собственным трудом. Более 12 лет они откармливают мелкий и крупный скот на дому.  Шавкат закупает скот на рынках подешевле   и оставляет на 3-4 мес. откармливать. Это приносит ему хорошую выгоду и он решил заниматься этим делом навсегда.Кроме этого у него есть и другой доход который позволяет ему двойную пользу: он водит грузовую автомашину.Шавкат перевозит всякие материалы, скот, сено короче всё по сезону.Он старается всячески подработать на жизнь.
texts.en:
Shavkat N. is a young man, who has secondary education. He is 30 years old, married and has three children. Shavkat's family is friendly. They work together, earning their bread with their own hard work. They have been raising cattle and small livestock at home for over 12 years. Shavkat buys livestock at markets at low prices and feeds it for 3-4 months. Because this brings him a good profit, he decided to be involved in this business forever. Besides this, he has another source of income, which provides him with a dual benefit: he drives a heavy-duty truck. Shavkat transports various materials, livestock, hay and basically everything seasonal. He tries to earn a living in many ways.

Translated from Russian by Anna Sorokina-Hailey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of livestock

loans.name: Yinka

texts.en: Yinka O. is 36 years old and married with two children. She sells kitchen utensils like plates, spoons, forks, etc. She is requesting a loan of NGN 60,000 to purchase more kitchen utensils.  She thanks all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more kitchen utensils

loans.name: Fumilayo

texts.en: Fumilayo sells phone accessories and rechargeable phone cards. Fumilayo is 28 years old and lives in Lagos state. Fumilayo is asking for a loan of NGN 50,000 to purchase more rechargeable phone cards and phone accessories to sell. She says thank you.

loans.use: To purchase phone accessories and rechargeable phone cards
